JUDGES: David Thór Björgvinsson;Giovanni Bonello;Lech Garlicki;Ledi Bianku;Nicolas Bratza
TEXT: The applicants , Mr PERSON ( Takis ) PERSON and PERSON ( NORP ) PERSON , are of NORP - Cypriot origin and have dual nationality , NORP and NORP . They were born in DATE and in DATE respectively and live in GPE . They are represented before the ORG by PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE , GPE .
ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , as were the intervening Government , GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the applicants , may be summarised as follows .

The applicants were married in DATE . They built a house on land donated by the father of the second applicant ; however the land had not been transferred into their names . It appears that the second applicant 's father has since died .
The second applicant owned CARDINAL plots of land situated in GPE . The first applicant was a businessman and prior to DATE had run a petrol station in GPE on rented land and LOC .
Since DATE the applicants have not had access to and/or use of their home and property in the northern part of GPE .
